sentences.en: A telephone call between Moratti and Lotito will unblock the whole situation.
sentences.cn: 莫拉蒂和洛蒂托之间的一段电话通话扫除了一切障碍.

sentences.en: Because I want to inspire, motivate, and “unblock” writers so that they can follow their passion with greater ease.
sentences.cn: 因为我想激发，鼓励作者们，解除他们的障碍，以便让他们能够更轻松随性的创作。

sentences.en: Crossbar switch is unblock network, it allows all possible simultaneous connect from point to point.
sentences.cn: 交叉开关是无阻塞网络, 允许所有可能的点对点间的同时连接.

sentences.en: If you unblock the pipe, the water will run back into the house.
sentences.cn: 如果堵不住管道, 水就会流回到屋里.

sentences.en: Invalid unblock code. Contact your service provider for assistance.
sentences.cn: 无效的解锁代码. 请与服务提供商联系以获得帮助.

sentences.en: The priority, in terms of stemming the panic, is to unblock clogged credit markets.
sentences.cn: 首先, 在制止恐慌方面, 是为淤塞的信贷市场打扫障碍.

sentences.en: Therapeutically neutralizing poison to unblock collaterals and subcollaterals would increase the curative effect.
sentences.cn: 在治疗上当参以解毒通络疗法,以提高疗效.

sentences.en: To unblock control box from the safety position, push the red button on the control panel.
sentences.cn: 要使程控器从安全闭锁中解开, 按程控器面板上的红色按钮.

sentences.en: Unblock the pipe and run the dirty water through.
sentences.cn: 把堵赛的管子通一通,让脏水流过去.

sentences.en: We had to call a plumber to unblock the drains.
sentences.cn: 我们得叫管工来通一通下水道.

sentences.en: We have to call a handyman to unblock the pipe.
sentences.cn: 我们必须叫个杂工把水管通一通.

sentences.en: We should call a plumber to unblock the drains.
sentences.cn: 我们应该叫管工来通一通下水道.
